bibl.title: Faces of Hellenism. Studies in the History of the Eastern Mediterranean (4th Century B.C. - 5th Century A.D.). (Studia Hellenistica. 48.)
bibl.note: 14 contributions, marking the retirement of L. Mooren, G. Schepens, and H. Hauben as professors of Ancient History in Leuven, in successive years from 2006 onwards. - Pp. 1-9: Peter VAN NUFFELEN, Introduction.
VAN NUFFELEN Peter (Ed.), Faces of Hellenism. Studies in the History of the Eastern Mediterranean (4th Century B.C. - 5th Century A.D.). (Studia Hellenistica. 48.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., Peeters, 2009, 8°, x-342 pp. ISBN 978-90-429-2273-0. €62.
